alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 22 at 9:00AM MST until December 23 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...El Paso, Crowley, and Kiowa counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 10 AM MST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Western Kiowa County
